entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
